attributes.action: DWP Job Centres and employment agencies should work togther
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to take action, as to the long term unemployed between 16 and 60.
The long term unemployed should make regular visits to the DWP job centres , but also be registered with more than one local recruiting agency.
If the person has a skill or is made available to take work when recommended by the Job Centre, there registration with local employment agencies as to getting work,
The job centres should be in contact with employment agency's ,to insure the long term unemployed can and will get work.
